title: 12/02/20 DPS-BEST OF
itunes:title: 12/02/20 DPS-BEST OF
description:
On Today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP previews this afternoon's matchup between the Ravens and Steelers.Who will ultimately suit up for Baltimore today? We're joined by Sunday Night Football on NBC sideline reporter Michele Tofoya, Sports Illustrated's Pat Forde, and Steelers beat writer for the Pittsburgh Post Gazette Gerry Dulac. Plus, DP discusses Kevin Durant's comments about James Harden

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
